hgt.title: CX_129A HGT File
hgt.description: Digital elevation model (DEM) used during processing and ground projection

inc.title: CX_129A Incidence Angle File
inc.description: Ground range local incidence angle, the angle between the surface normal and the radar line of sight.

slope.title: CX_129A Terrain Slope File
slope.description: Ground range terrain slope containing the derivatives of the DEM in the East and North direction, used to compute the local incidence angle

rtc.title: CX_129A Radiometric Terrain Correction Factor
rtc.description: Radiometric terrain correction factor that can be applied to grd files

h5.title: CD_129 HDF5 Data File
h5.description: No Dither: 129 Frequency HDF5 file in NISAR format

slcHH.title: CX_129A HH Polarization Single Look Complex File
slcHH.description: Single look complex slant range image for HH polarization

slcHV.title: CX_129A HV Polarization Single Look Complex File
slcHV.description: Single look complex slant range image for HV polarization

slcVH.title: CX_129A VH Polarization Single Look Complex File
slcVH.description: Single look complex slant range image for VH polarization

slcVV.title: CX_129A VV Polarization Single Look Complex File
slcVV.description: Single look complex slant range image for VV polarization

mlcHHHH.title: CX_129A HHHH Crossproduct Multi Look File
mlcHHHH.description: Multi look cross product slant range image for crossproduct HHHH

mlcHVHV.title: CX_129A HVHV Crossproduct Multi Look File
mlcHVHV.description: Multi look cross product slant range image for crossproduct HVHV

mlcVVVV.title: CX_129A VVVV Crossproduct Multi Look File
mlcVVVV.description: Multi look cross product slant range image for crossproduct VVVV

mlcHHHV.title: CX_129A HHHV Crossproduct Multi Look File
mlcHHHV.description: Multi look cross product slant range image for crossproduct HHHV

mlcHHVV.title: CX_129A HHVV Crossproduct Multi Look File
mlcHHVV.description: Multi look cross product slant range image for crossproduct HHVV

mlcHVVV.title: CX_129A HVVV Crossproduct Multi Look File
mlcHVVV.description: Multi look cross product slant range image for crossproduct HVVV

grdHHHH.title: CX_129A Ground Range Projected File for Crossproduct HHHH
grdHHHH.description: No Dither: 129A ground range projected (equiangular) and multi-looked data for crossproduct HHHH

grdHVHV.title: CX_129A Ground Range Projected File for Crossproduct HVHV
grdHVHV.description: No Dither: 129A ground range projected (equiangular) and multi-looked data for crossproduct HVHV

grdVVVV.title: CX_129A Ground Range Projected File for Crossproduct VVVV
grdVVVV.description: No Dither: 129A ground range projected (equiangular) and multi-looked data for crossproduct VVVV

grdHHHV.title: CX_129A Ground Range Projected File for Crossproduct HHHV
grdHHHV.description: No Dither: 129A ground range projected (equiangular) and multi-looked data for crossproduct HHHV

grdHHVV.title: CX_129A Ground Range Projected File for Crossproduct HHVV
grdHHVV.description: No Dither: 129A ground range projected (equiangular) and multi-looked data for crossproduct HHVV

grdHVVV.title: CX_129A Ground Range Projected File for Crossproduct HVVV
grdHVVV.description: No Dither: 129A ground range projected (equiangular) and multi-looked data for crossproduct HVVV

kmz.title: CX_129A Keyhole Markup Language Zipped File
kmz.description: Full resolution image representing the GRD data in Keyhole Markup Language
